name: Pirate Bay (Pandamnesik, Delvatron, Wolfens, Thomas Foucault)
name_original: Pirate Bay (Pandamnesik, Delvatron, Wolfens, Thomas Foucault)
description:
Play Francine, a pirate with no mercy. Find buried treasure chests before the others and throw them in their face to steal their loot.

Eitan ~ Game Designer
Alexis ~ UX/UI Designer
Thomas ~ Programmer
Valentin ~ Programmer
Lionel ~ Programmer
Meghan ~ 3D Graphist - Environnement 
Perrine ~ 3D Graphist - Character
